text: Hagi Israeli vahetamine Juda vahetamimo'zama Juda rankumatamimpima nemaniza vahe'mo'za bulimakao afuzmine, sipisipi afuzmine hampriza nevazageno, 10nima hia bulimakao afutamine sipisipi afutaminena avre'za e'naze. Ana nehu'za Ra Anumzana zamagri Anumzamofonte'ma eri ruotgema hu'nea zantamina hampriza nevazageno 10nima hia zantamina eri'za eme kevure kevure antazageno agonagna huno hihi huno mareri'ne.
